Google also announced that its board of directors had approved certain changes to Google's management team, the company said in a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission.`` Larry Page , Google's co-founder and president of products, will become Google's chief executive officer, effective April 4, 2011.

It doesn't matter what happened in three quarters. If you pull it out and you win, enough said.
